name: Chaicoon
description:
You have started a milktea business and your future plan is to build a milktea empire and become a Chaicoon! But before that, your skills must be tested first. Serve all incoming customers for 5 days!

Prepare the drink according to the order. Use your mouse to drag and drop pearls, sugar, and ice onto the milktea to add them and then serve your delicious milktea to your customers!

Upgrades can be bought to increase slots and quicken milk and tea fill ups.

Art and code by me

Music and SFX are public domain (Kenney, Freesound, Gamesounds.xyz)
